## BaseManager interface

A base for any manager classes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseManager<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.basemanager.cache.md) | Collection&lt;any, T&gt; | The cache to store any data that can be avoided fetching repeatedly. |
|  [client](./shieldbow.basemanager.client.md) | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client this manager is being used by. |
|  [fetch](./shieldbow.basemanager.fetch.md) | (id: any, options: { force: boolean; }) =&gt; Promise&lt;T&gt; | The method to actually fetch the data. |
